pools.name: Arduino UNO
pools.description: Arduino UNO is a popular microcontroller board based on the ATmega328P.

pools.name: Arduino Leonardo
pools.description: Arduino Leonardo features the ATmega32u4 microcontroller and has built-in USB communication.

pools.name: Arduino MEGA
pools.description: Arduino MEGA is based on the ATmega2560 microcontroller and provides more IO pins and memory compared to Arduino UNO.

pools.name: Arduino FIO
pools.description: Arduino FIO is designed for wireless communication using XBee modules.

pools.name: Arduino Pro
pools.description: Arduino Pro is a compact and low-power version of Arduino boards.

pools.name: Arduino Pro Mini
pools.description: Arduino Pro Mini is a smaller version of Arduino Pro board.

pools.name: Arduino Nano
pools.description: Arduino Nano is a compact and breadboard-friendly version of Arduino boards.

pools.name: TinyDuino
pools.description: TinyDuino is a tiny, stackable microcontroller board compatible with Arduino.

pools.name: BotBoarduino
pools.description: BotBoarduino is an Arduino-compatible microcontroller board for robotics applications.

pools.name: Dagu Micro Magician v2
pools.description: Dagu Micro Magician v2 is a small robot controller board with integrated motor drivers.

pools.name: Red Back Spider
pools.description: Red Back Spider is an Arduino-compatible microcontroller board with additional features.

pools.name: TI Launchpad
pools.description: TI Launchpad is a microcontroller development board compatible with Energia (Arduino-like environment).

pools.name: BeagleBone-IO
pools.description: BeagleBone-IO is a library for using BeagleBone Black with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: Blend-Micro-IO
pools.description: Blend-Micro-IO is a library for using RedBearLab's Blend Micro with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: Galileo-IO
pools.description: Galileo-IO is a library for using Intel Galileo boards with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: Bean-IO
pools.description: Bean-IO is a library for using PunchThrough's LightBlue Bean with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: Nino-IO
pools.description: Nino-IO is a library for using MediaTek Labs' LinkIt Nino with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: pcDuino-IO
pools.description: pcDuino-IO is a library for using pcDuino boards with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: Pinoccio-IO
pools.description: Pinoccio-IO is a library for using Pinoccio boards with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: Raspi-IO
pools.description: Raspi-IO is a library for using Raspberry Pi boards with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: Spark-IO
pools.description: Spark-IO is a library for using Spark Core and Photon boards with Johnny-Five.

pools.name: Imp-IO
pools.description: Imp-IO is a library for using Electric Imp boards with Johnny-Five.
